mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_job.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,vald_yn /* vald_yn 유효_여부 character(1) */ ,accu_avg_val /* accu_avg_val 누적_평균_값 numeric */ ,accu_sdev_val /* accu_sdev_val 누적_표준편차_값 numeric */ ,down_stnd_val /* down_stnd_val 하위_기준_값 numeric */ ,uppr_stnd_val /* uppr_stnd_val 상위_기준_값 numeric */ ,bot_blck_val /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 character(18) */ ,down_blck_val /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 character(18) */ ,uppr_blck_val /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 character(18) */ ,top_blck_val /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 character(18) */ FROM ts_dd_hbit_job WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_job.insert */ INSERT INTO ts_dd_hbit_job ( stdt_no /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ ,stnd_dt /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,vald_yn /* vald_yn 유효_여부 character(1) */ ,accu_avg_val /* accu_avg_val 누적_평균_값 numeric */ ,accu_sdev_val /* accu_sdev_val 누적_표준편차_값 numeric */ ,down_stnd_val /* down_stnd_val 하위_기준_값 numeric */ ,uppr_stnd_val /* uppr_stnd_val 상위_기준_값 numeric */
,bot_blck_val /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,down_blck_val /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,uppr_blck_val /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 character(18) */
,top_blck_val /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 character(18) */
) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */ ,#{valdYn} /* vald_yn 유효_여부 character(1) */ ,#{accuAvgVal} /* accu_avg_val 누적_평균_값 numeric */ ,#{accuSdevVal} /* accu_sdev_val 누적_표준편차_값 numeric */ ,#{downStndVal} /* down_stnd_val 하위_기준_값 numeric */ ,#{upprStndVal} /* uppr_stnd_val 상위_기준_값 numeric */
,#{botBlckVal} /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,#{downBlckVal} /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,#{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 character(18) */
,#{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 character(18) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_dd_hbit_job.update */ UPDATE ts_dd_hbit_job
,vald_yn = #{valdYn} /* vald_yn 유효_여부 character(1) */
,accu_avg_val = #{accuAvgVal} /* accu_avg_val 누적_평균_값 numeric */
,accu_sdev_val = #{accuSdevVal} /* accu_sdev_val 누적_표준편차_값 numeric */
,down_stnd_val = #{downStndVal} /* down_stnd_val 하위_기준_값 numeric */
,uppr_stnd_val = #{upprStndVal} /* uppr_stnd_val 상위_기준_값 numeric */
,bot_blck_val = #{botBlckVal} /* bot_blck_val 최하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,down_blck_val = #{downBlckVal} /* down_blck_val 하위_구간_값 character(18) */
,uppr_blck_val = #{upprBlckVal} /* uppr_blck_val 상위_구간_값 character(18) */
,top_blck_val = #{topBlckVal} /* top_blck_val 최상위_구간_값 character(18) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no 학생_번호 numeric */ AND stnd_dt = #{stndDt} /* stnd_dt 기준_일자 character(8) */
